item.title: SAS Certified, Again
item.description: Last week I got another SAS certification, SAS Certified Data Integration Developer for SAS 9 and I must say it can’t be better as a SAS holiday gift for myself! I took all my SAS certificates when employed (when in Sanofi Pasteur, 2010, I got two SAS programming certificates, Base and Advanced). You may say it’s kind of certificate for sake of certificate and not for applying a job like college students.
